content: TE-H Tamping plates Ultra-robust tamping plate for compacting earth and asphalt using the third-gen TE 3000 or H28 demolition tools with clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Tamping plate only – to be used with a compatible universal shank Upgraded tamping power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the plate Better reliability – these tamping plates are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Multiple sizes available – helping you to match the chisel to the needs of the job Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Compacting dirt and sand For use with third-generation TE 3000 electric jackhammers and H28 demolition tools with clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) Application: Compacting Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Connection end | TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) | Application | Compacting | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2312437 - Tamper plate TE-H TP 15x15 - Package Size 1 pc - 2312438 - Tamper plate TE-H TP 20x20 - Package Size 1 pc - 2429811 - Tamper plate TE-H TP 20x20 - Package Size 1 pc
